response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $800,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while also maximizing the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors.", "product_price": 750000}
